Coral_Springs.Coral Springs Christian Academy:
Coral Springs Christian Academy (CSCA) is a private school in Coral Springs, Florida, serving 1,100 students in pre-school through 12th grade.
The school is a ministry of First Presbyterian Church of Coral Springs . Also known as CSCA, the school opened in the 1970s as an elementary and middle school and high school called "Coral Springs Christian School".
CSCA is accredited by the Southern Association of Colleges and Schools (SACS), Association of Christian Schools International (ACSI), and the Florida Council of Independent Schools (FCIS).
The school will be sold to Somerset so 2018 will be the last year. They may however merge with Parkridge.
